amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce the funding for Army Corps of Engineers - Civil; Investigations by $715,000 for the purpose of eliminating funding for the Delaware River Basin Commission.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the funding for Army Corps of Engineers - Civil; Investigations by $715,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 265 (Roll no. 529).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 265 (Roll no. 529).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
